fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Speak with the dead at night, you may use a dead players body, unless they are a killer.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You can use any body an unlimited amount of times.
All dead players will win if you live until the end of the game.
If your action would cause a player to die (even if its something like a transport), your ability will fail.
You will resurrect two days after your death, but the dead players will no longer be able to win with you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the end of the game.
